jobDescription: JOB DESCRIPTION: Description of Position, Primary Function or Responsibilities  Air Education and Training Command is creating a new Chief Data Officer function. The Data Security Analyst will be part of the technical support team who would define, build and manage a new learning services system to modernize the commands learning environment. This would include engaging with stakeholders to learn about needs and existing solutions, creating a new technical backbone for the command, and helping develop a modern data strategy.  The Data Security Analyst is responsible for Implementing or managing security functionality or controls in data center environments. Provides excellent technical skills and knowledge to successfully manage project work; broad understanding of network, database and application security issues. Provide broad hands-on knowledge of firewalls, intrusion detection systems, anti-virus software, data encryptions, and other industry-standard techniques and practices. MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE Bachelors or Masters degree in information systems, computer security or related field.  Secret clearance. PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE Experience on MAJCOM staff; familiarity with flying training, aircraft maintenance and related data systems; strong research, problem solving, interpersonal and communications skills.  Contingent upon contract award.SDL2017
